lead_paragraph: The most difficult major offensive in two years of fluctuating battle clawed slowly last week across the North African desert. It had been launched eight days ago, just before dawn, by a mighty Allied artillery barrage reminiscent of the gun-wheel-to-gun-wheel fire of World War I.
abstract: Ital morale under Axis rule discussed
